name: Oath EMEA Ltd. (previously known as Yahoo! EMEA Ltd.)
legal: Limited liability company under Irish law
goal: Oath, a subsidiary of Verizon, is a values-led company committed to building brands people love. We reach one billion people around the world with a dynamic house of media and technology brands. A global leader in digital and mobile, Oath is shaping the future of media. For more on Oath, visit www.oath.com.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, GDPR, e-Privacy, Audiovisual Media Services Directive (AVMSD), Copyright Reform.
